actions.recommendation: You need to cut down on alcohol use. Reach out to your preferred health professional if you feel that you would benefit from some support in changing this behaviour.
3 Days of 30-40mins exercise is recommended weekly.
Fruit & vegetables are part of a healthy, balanced diet and can help you stay healthy.
Avoid Sugar. The effects of added sugar intake are all linked to an increased risk for heart attack and stroke.
Reported tingling sensation on the face sometimes, the possible causes require a work up to identify, please consult with your family doctor about these symptoms
Raised waist to height ratio: This can be addressed with exercise.

Blood pressure: You are being treated for hypertension. The ideal blood pressure is considered to be between 90-60mmHg diastolic (bottom number) and 120-80mmHg systolic (top number). Try to optimise your diet.
